about_the_game:
The Maids are back... This time the Maid Cafe will be hosting a very special competition: The local Idol show! And Lilly wants you to take part, but not as a judge as a mentor for one of the potential Idols. You have just a few weeks to do everything you can to raise this girls profile before the competition takes place and the Cafe's clientele determines the final winner.

Meet the Girls!

Mentor one of the girls and help them achieve online idol fame.

Choose her Speciality

Make decisions on how she should promote herself online.

Make your own choices

You can choose many different paths for your idol and train her however you see fit.

Success or Failure

It is all in your hands as your decisions will determine if she succeeds in her dream of becoming the local Idol!

content_descriptors.notes:
The game includes explicit nudity and sexual content.
All characters depicted within this game are over 18.

detailed_description:
The Maids are back... This time the Maid Cafe will be hosting a very special competition: The local Idol show! And Lilly wants you to take part, but not as a judge as a mentor for one of the potential Idols. You have just a few weeks to do everything you can to raise this girls profile before the competition takes place and the Cafe's clientele determines the final winner.

Meet the Girls!

Mentor one of the girls and help them achieve online idol fame.

Choose her Speciality

Make decisions on how she should promote herself online.

Make your own choices

You can choose many different paths for your idol and train her however you see fit.

Success or Failure

It is all in your hands as your decisions will determine if she succeeds in her dream of becoming the local Idol!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 +
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.6 or later
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Delightful Sins

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
